posts.postText:
Your In-Game name: Jet
Your Steam ID: STEAM_0:1:30614163
Reason: Im still here
Length of Ban/Date and time of Unban: 17:28 1 May 2011
What server were you playing?: TTT
Who banned you?: ??n?? ???????? [????uu]  (it was That Guy)
Why should we unban you?:Because what I did had a reason behind it. I killed the admin, who was a traitor, and never stated why I did. Before I could tell him why, I was banned.

I also forgot to mention to use this format 
 Your In-Game name:
Your Steam ID:
Reason:
Length of Ban/Date and Time of Unban:
What server were you playing?:
Who banned you?:
Why should we unban you?:
 

Edit: Yeah, really
It was a 60 minute ban for premeditated and blantant rdm of moderator to see if you would get away with it.
If it was under a day, you cannot be unbanned.  Wait out the hour kkay?

No, it wasn't.
I had a reason.
One of the innocent terrorists who died was typing "It's LJ and Th-" when they died, and the ONLY other person in the game with a TH starting their name was Theportalsniper, who was clear because he killed a traitor.
I don't care if you have authority, you were wrong.
I did not RDM.

>> If it was under a day, you cannot be unbanned.  Wait out the hour kkay? 

Oh, okay.
Well, still.
I really despise the reasoning to which I was banned.
Just to clear a few things up, i was there and heard what Jet said. His exact words were. "I really think its you, will i get slayed if i kill you." You can not kill for suspicion.
Forgot to lock this. No more input/discussion needed.
